title: $129+: Pet-Friendly Stays in San Diego
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > $129+: Pet-Friendly Stays in San Diego $129+: Pet-Friendly Stays in San Diego   October 9, 2015 at 7:55 PM Tweet 
Bring Fido along on your next San Diego visit because the Town and Country Resort & Convention Center is making it easier to travel with your best friend. The resort's pet-friendly offer of $129 per night includes overnight accommodations, waived pet cleaning fees, access to the onsite pet run, and a pet grab-bag, including a bowl, treats, a ball, and clean-up bags upon check-in. 
How to get this deal: For more information or to book accommodations, visit the Town and Country Resort & Convention Center site. Use promo code DOGVACA . The offer provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
